Mi Experiencia Laboral

Heres your guide to the tech fest 2021 process. Go through all the steps to know the exact process of the fest.

8-10 Marzo, 2023

Ganador Hackathon SCZ 4.0

Pick your favourite event(s) and register in that event by filling the form corresponding to that event. Its that easy :)

Flutter Firebase Google API

Abril-Agosto, 2023

AssureSoft

Participate online. The links for your registered events will be sent to you via email and whatsapp groups. Use those links and show your talent.

NestJs Angular PostgreSQL

10 Agosto, 2023

Peg Lab Vet

The ultimate genius will be revealed by our judging panel on 10th May, 2021 and the resukts will be announced on the whatsapp groups and will be mailed to you.

Laravel Livewire MySQL

12 May, 2021

Prize Distribution

The winners will be contacted by our team for their addresses and the winning goodies will be sent at their addresses.
